name: Comfort Inn Near Old Town Pasadena - Eagle Rock

reviews.text: On arrival this motel appeared rather dismal. We had a handicapped room (it must have been the only thing available when I booked). Although the unit was clean, the carpet was very old and appeared dirty and worn. I felt that they took advantage of the Rose Bowl and Parade by making minimum stay of 3 nights and nearly tripled the price of the room. We did not use the third night and since we had two rooms this was quite an additional expense. I must say they did go out of their way to provide very good information about the parade, transportation, restaurants, etc. All in all, we were happy to be close to the venues and were in our rooms very little.
reviews.title: Great location for Rose Bowl game and parade

reviews.text: My daughter and I stayed at the "Comfort Inn Near Old Town Pasadena" when we went to the Rose Bowl. To be honest I wasn't sure what to expect considering that the rates were pretty low in comparison to some of the other hotels in the area but I have to say that this hotel was pretty nice. The rooms were clean, the staff were AWESOME and this hotel was located near everything that we were interested in seeing: Rose Bowl - 4 miles, Universal Studios - about 20 minutes and Hollywood Blvd - about 30 minutes. I would have no problem in staying at this hotel again.
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was below average for the price paid. It was listed as "near Old Towne Pasadena" but was over 5 miles away. If it is listed as "near" one would assume you could be within walking distance. Eagle Rock is in the city of Los Angeles, it isn't in Pasadena yet I was paying Pasadena prices for a substandard room.
reviews.title: Overpriced for the accomodations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There was hair on the walls of the bathroom and a door with a poorly repaired hole.
reviews.title: Great location and value.

reviews.text: The main street that fronted on the hotel was pretty noisy.
reviews.title: Friendly staff

reviews.text: The staff is great, room is good and location is ok.
reviews.title: Great Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I frequent this hotel because of the friendly staff and great service. There is a wide variety of quality breakfast items included in the free breakfast and the hotel is convenietnly located for easy shopping and dinning.
reviews.title: Always Friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel several times because it is close to family and friends in LA but is also a very clean and safe hotel at a good price. It is only about 20 mins to Burbank airport, 10 min to Pasadena, 15 mins to Chinatown/downtown plus you get a free breakfast and parking is free. Eagle Rock is a somewhat secluded and unknown part of LA but it's safe and has everything you need close by with less traffic. I always consider this hotel when I need to be in the Glendale/Pasadena area.
reviews.title: Good value hotel, convenient to valley and downtown

reviews.text: freeway close, easy to find places to eat, nice staff,
reviews.title: simple, nice, easy, hotel

reviews.text: I wanted a good clean room that was cheap. I could spend the night and get up to go back to work the next day ( I was working 12-16 hours per day that week). That's what I got...a basic good clean room. I priced other cheaper hotels on colorado blvd ...they had that "thick Lysol' smell in the room"...Oh No! Not for me!
reviews.title: Best Deal in Eagle Rock.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend I stood here so we could get away for the weekend. It was the perfect stay. The hotel staff is super nice and the rooms are super clean! Plus, you can't go wrong with free wireless internet when most hotels make you cough up at least $10 a day for their wireless. We will definitely be staying here again :] If you're in the Pasadena, Eagle Rock, Glendale area visiting I would definitely recommend staying here because I know we will, again.
reviews.title: Great place to stay for a weekend get away and more!

reviews.text: Whenever i come to Eagle Rock, CA (which i do quite often) to visit my young children i stay at the Comfort Inn. Thay are always friendly and charming and i nearly never have a problem booking the room.  They have a laundry room which i find helpful. I'm a little too bohemian to arise for their continental breakfast (6 to 9 AM) but i imagine most folks in the jet set business world find that just right. Avoid the smoking rooms, they are a bit saturated even if you smoke.
reviews.title: "My second home"

reviews.text: My travels for work takes me everywhere in the lower 48 states. This Comfort Inn by far rates in the top choices for Los Angeles and southern Calif. Location is ideal, Dodger stadiem, Hollywood, China Town, and "The Valley" are minutes away. Food on just about every corner and a mall just off CA 2.
reviews.title: Best value for short notice

reviews.text: The staff is always willing to help if a problem arises and gives directions. Rooms are very clean.
reviews.title: Comfortable

reviews.text: We frequently use Comfort Inn when traveling. This location was exactly what we expected. The rooms were clean and in good condition. The vanity and tub appeared to be new. We'll use this location again on our next visit.
reviews.title: Everything we expected from a Comfort Inn

reviews.text: It was a very good stay. All the acomodation were in perfect shape and no had no issues with the service
reviews.title: christmas

reviews.text: The hotel was very nice and convenient. When I needed to have my coffee carafe replaced, the staff did that immediately.
reviews.title: the room was very clean and service was excellent

reviews.text: we stayed x-mas eve and x-mas night what a horrible room, first off we got a room for hubbie and my self then his sister was going to be alone so decided to take her with, called to ask for roll a way bed was told we got the last roll a way bed. asked if enough room for it without tripping over each other & was told probably not so we up grated to what was suppost to be a over sized room we paid over 200.00 and something for the 2 nights but at least we all will be comfortable was suppost to have 2 queen beds a sofa bed which she said would have a good bed inside of it this way we wouldnt need the roll away, ho yah she told me we got the last handicapped room also.
reviews.title: not room paid for,over priced,dirty,felt unsafe,noisie,sofa bed sunk in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: checked in went to room and there was a roll a way in the room which we saw through the window. meaning we couldnt get in the room the door was warped and the card wouldnt let us enter. had to go back to the front desk twice, finally got into the room opened up the hide a bed and the bed had a huge sink hole in the middle of it, opened up the roll away again a big sink hole in the middle of it now mind you we had got the last handicapped room so didnt go back to office as we needed the handicapped bathroom. so put the roll away mattress on top of the sofa bed and still had to sleep in a sink hole, very very uncomfortable. shower curtain was so dirty so had to go and buy a shower curtian liner we didnt trust them to give us a fresh one since the one in there was a dirty one to begin with.
reviews.title: Quiet, comfortable, clean, friendly and accommodating, well-located motel

aka: Comfort Inn Near Old Town Pasadena - Eagle Rock Hotel Los Angeles
description: This Comfort Inn is 3 miles from Pasadena and the Rose Bowl Stadium. This affordable hotel provides you with easy access to: Occidental College 1mi, Glendale CA 2mi, Dodger Stadium 5.5mi, Griffith Park 6mi, Hollywood 8mi, and Downtown LA LIVE 10mi. Hotel features: FREE HOT AMERICAN BREAKFAST, Free WI-FI, Free Parking & Local Calls, Spacious Newly Remodeled Rooms and much more. Whether you travel for business or pleasure this Comfort Inn is a great choice!
